title: Back Button Sensitivity Out of Whack
content:
Since the January update, the back button sensitivity moved to the right for non-Google apps (e.g. Whatsapp, Signal, etc).
While in the home screen or on Google apps, when I tap on the back arrow it works fine.
When I launch a non-Google app, I have to click way to the right for the back button to work.
I have reported the issue a few times but got no response yet. This is a major annoyance, especially for lefties.
